values: To mobilize is to prepare an army to fight in a war.
Thousands of soldiers were ready to mobilize for the fight.
vt. 动员，调动；集合，组织；使…流通；使…松动
vi. 动员起来；组织
时态:mobilized, mobilizing, mobilizes名 词:mobilization
